long_description: The Thule T2 XTR hitch mount has a convenient rear platform carrier to accommodate 2 bikes regardless of frame design, suspension or wheel size. Offers quick rear loading in seconds, with no need to remove wheels. SecureHook(TM) arm holds the front bike tire (not the frame) securely in place; no contact with frame means your bike doesn't get scratched. Tilt-down design has Hitch Switch(TM) dual quick-release levers for easy access to rear of vehicle and fast storage of bike arms when not in use. Reinforced tray features rust-free protection; tray fits 20- to 29-in. wheels and up to 3-in. wide tires. The included Snug-Tite(TM) lock secures your rack to the receiver; locking cable, hardwear, lock cyclinders, 2 lock keys and 1 change key included. The Thule T2 hitch mount carries bikes up to 60 lbs., or 100 lbs. total (based on the 1.25 in. hitch size).
short_description: The Thule T2 XTR hitch mount has a convenient rear platform carrier to accommodate 2 bikes regardless of frame design, suspension or wheel size.
